channel.title: Editing Item Bonuses Matrix
channel.description: I am not sure how to edit item bonuses in Matrix 718. In data/items there is a file called bonuses.bi (which I think that's the file I need to edit) When I open bonuses.bi I get shocked with foreign words and I think there is an extra java editor or something to edit item bonuses. Any help would be appreciated :-) :|
